titleStmt.title: Digital Edition of Glaser Abklatsch ID: AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-GL1119_02
AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-GL1119_02

item.term: Early first millennium to the fourth century BC (predominance of Saba)
Fourth to first centuries BC (predominance of Qataban and Hadramawt, and their alliance with Main)
First century BC to early second century AD (alliances between the tribes of the high plateau and the ASA kingdoms)
Late second to late third centuries AD (wars among the Himyar, Saba and Hadramawt)
Fourth to sixth centuries AD (unification of Yemen under Himyarite rule)
It corresponds to the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans with sub-periods I-IV
First sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Second sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Second sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Second sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Third sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Fourth sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Fourth sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans

graphic.desc: By kind permission of British Museum

1.Sharaḥʿathat bin ʿAbdʾīl of the lineage of Tanzabān 2.has directed and commanded and carried out all the hewing of stone and the construct- 3.[i]on of the tower of ʿArībum and its glacis from bot- 4.tom to top for his lord Shahr Ghaylān. 5.By ʿAthtar, and by ʿAmm, and by ʾAnbay, and by ʿAmm Dhū-Yāsi[ru-] 6.m, and by ʿAmm Dhū-Shaqīr, any by Ḥawkam, and by Dhāt-Ṣanatim, 7.and by Dhāt-Ẓāhirān, and by Dhāt-Raḥībān, and by his lord 8.[Sha]hr Ghaylān bin ʾAbīshibām and his son Biʿamm, King 9.of Qatabān.

Sharaḥʿathat bin ʿAbdʾīl of the lineage of Tanzabān
has directed and commanded and carried out all the hewing of stone and the construct-
ion of the tower of ʿArībum and its glacis from bot-
tom to top for his lord Shahr Ghaylān.
By ʿAthtar, and by ʿAmm, and by ʾAnbay, and by ʿAmm Dhū-Yāsiru-
m, and by ʿAmm Dhū-Shaqīr, any by Ḥawkam, and by Dhāt-Ṣanatim,
and by Dhāt-Ẓāhirān, and by Dhāt-Raḥībān, and by his lord
Shahr Ghaylān bin ʾAbīshibām and his son Biʿamm, King
of Qatabān.

Sharaḥʿathat bin ʿAbdʾīl of the lineage of Tanzabān
has directed and commanded and carried out all the hewing of stone and the construct-
ion of the tower of ʿArībum and its glacis from bot-
tom to top for his lord Shahr Ghaylān.
By ʿAthtar, and by ʿAmm, and by ʾAnbay, and by ʿAmm Dhū-Yāsiru-
m, and by ʿAmm Dhū-Shaqīr, any by Ḥawkam, and by Dhāt-Ṣanatim,
and by Dhāt-Ẓāhirān, and by Dhāt-Raḥībān, and by his lord
Shahr Ghaylān bin ʾAbīshibām and his son Biʿamm, King
of Qatabān.

Sharaḥʿathat bin ʿAbdʾīl of the lineage of Tanzabān
has directed and commanded and carried out all the hewing of stone and the construct-
ion of the tower of ʿArībum and its glacis from bot-
tom to top for his lord Shahr Ghaylān.
By ʿAthtar, and by ʿAmm, and by ʾAnbay, and by ʿAmm Dhū-Yāsiru-
m, and by ʿAmm Dhū-Shaqīr, any by Ḥawkam, and by Dhāt-Ṣanatim,
and by Dhāt-Ẓāhirān, and by Dhāt-Raḥībān, and by his lord
Shahr Ghaylān bin ʾAbīshibām and his son Biʿamm, King
of Qatabān.
